title: Exodus by Paul Antony Jones (Extinction Point, #2)
description:
Reporter Emily Baxter survived the alien red rain that blanketed and annihilated the human race. But after the downpour, and the lethal contagion it spread, came an even greater horror: the rampant transformation of the dead into something utterly unearthly.
With a terrifying new form of life emerging from the mutated landscape, EmilyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only hope is to flee toward distant Alaska where she can unite with the survivors who have reached out to her from a remote science facility. The journey from New York will be long and painstaking, and Emily has only her faithful dog and whatever she can carry. But, after discovering a small family of refugees along the way, EmilyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s determination to escape the unfolding catastrophe and carve out a new future is renewed. Standing in their way are EarthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new masters, equally determined to survive and thrive, and possessed of monstrous capabilities Emily and her allies canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t begin to imagineÃ¢â‚¬Â¦until theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re face to face with the hideous reality.
In the battle about to begin, there will be no room for mistakes or mercyÃ¢â‚¬â€only the most ruthless instincts to survive.

Genre: Science Fiction
